title: Ep. - 254 - THE LAST DANCE REVIEW ON ESPN
description:
The Last Dance is a documentary miniseries about the career of Michael Jordan, with particular focus on the 1997–98 Chicago Bulls season. The series features film from a crew that had an all-access pass to the Bulls during the National Basketball Association season. It has become ESPN’s most viewed documentary series in the network’s history.

 

Roland Lazenby is the author of the bestselling and definitive biographies of Michael Jordan. Roland gives insight into Jordan’s childhood, his career with The Bulls, questions about his gambling, his relationship with other players including Kobe Bryant, and more.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
